trans-unit.source: Represents a reference to a discovery document.
This class cannot be inherited.
XML Web services discovery involves discovering the available XML Web services given an URL.
trans-unit.target: XML Web 服务发现涉及发现可用的 XML Web 服务提供一个 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL typically points to a discovery document, which usually has a.disco file name extension.
trans-unit.target: 通常，此 URL 指向发现文档，它通常具有 a.disco 文件扩展名。

trans-unit.source: The discovery document contains references to information about the existance of XML Web services, such as Service Descriptions, XML Schema Definition language (XSD) schemas, or other discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: 发现文档包含有关的信息存在的 XML Web 服务，如服务说明、 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构或其他发现文档的引用。

trans-unit.source: This class represents a reference to a discovery document.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示对发现文档的引用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference" /> class.
Reference to a discovery document.
The <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference.Ref" /> property is set to the value of <c>href</c>.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference" /> class, setting the <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference.Ref" /> property to the value of <paramref name="href" />.
Gets the name of the default file to use when saving the referenced discovery document.
Name of the default file to use when saving the referenced document to a file.
trans-unit.target: 要在引用的文档保存到文件时使用的默认文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the contents of the referenced discovery document as a <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> object.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> representing the contents of the referenced discovery document.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" />表示引用的发现文档的内容。

trans-unit.source: If the discovery document has not been downloaded and added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> property of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A>, an attempt to download and resolve the document is made.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有下载发现文档并将其添加到<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A>，下载和解析文档尝试。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
-or-
An error occurred during the download or resolution of the XSD schema using <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol" />.
<see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> containing the discovery document.
Reads and returns the discovery document from the passed <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> containing the contents of the referenced discovery document.
Gets or sets the reference to a discovery document.
Reference to a discovery document.
For most references, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference.Ref%2A> property is a URL, such as http://www.contoso.com/MyWebService.disco.
trans-unit.target: 对于大多数的引用，<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference.Ref%2A>属性是一个 URL，例如http://www.contoso.com/MyWebService.disco。

trans-unit.source: Verifies that all referenced documents within the discovery document are valid.

Unless you specifically need to resolve the individual references of a <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference> object, you should invoke the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A> methods of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol>.
trans-unit.target: 除非特别需要解析的单个引用<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference>对象，应调用<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll%2A>或<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol>。

trans-unit.source: This method resolves all references to discovery documents, XSD schemas, and Service Descriptions in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> property of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A> and any references found in referring discovery documents.
trans-unit.target: 此方法解析对发现文档、 XSD 架构和服务说明中的所有引用<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A>以及在引用发现文档中找到的任何引用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
-or-
The discovery document could not be downloaded and verified successfully.
Gets or sets the URL of the referenced discovery document.
The URL of the referenced discovery document.
trans-unit.target: 引用的发现文档的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference.Ref%2A> property.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> to write into <c>stream</c>.
The <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> into which the serialized discovery document is written.
Writes the passed <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument" /> into the passed <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
